abilities.title: Blood Scent
abilities.description: Orcs can track the scent of blood up to 1000 ft (305 m) away. Base Skill: 15% +5% per level of experience. Nightvision 40 ft (12.2 m), excellent day vision (human norm).

abilities.title: Scent Recognition
abilities.description: Orcs recognize and follow familiar scents up to 50 ft (15 m) away. Base Skill: 10% +3% per level of experience; +13% for mate or offspring. Roll every 100 ft (30.5 m); failure loses the trail.

abilities.title: O.C.C. Bonuses
abilities.description: +1 to roll with impact, +3 to save vs horror factor.
